rules_text:
Ninjutsu {R}{G}
Menace
[i]Dishonorable Thief[/i] – Whenever Asugi, Sweet-Toothed Ninja attacks and isn't blocked, exile the top card of that players library face down, You may play that card until the end of your next turn and it costs {X} less to cast, where X is the number of Foods you control.
[i]Sweet Tooth[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, create a Food token.
